properties.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 2:00PM MST until February 8 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations 6 to 12
inches. Mixed precipitation expected below 4500 feet. Ice
accumulation of a light glaze expected. Winds gusting as high
as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce,
Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY
